item.title: Amymarie814 add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "She wore a dress Ronan thought looked like a lampshade. Whatever sort of lamp it belonged on, Gansey clearly wished he had one. Ronan wasn't a fan of lamps." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Amymarie814 add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "I wish you could be kissed, Jane,' he said. 'Because I would beg just one off you. Under all this.' He flailed an arm toward the stars." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Amymarie814 add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "If you never saw the stars, candles were enough." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Amymarie814 add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "In some parallel universe, there was a Gansey who could tell Blue that he found the ten inches of her bare calves far more tantalizing than the thirteen cubic feet of bare skin Orla sported. But in this universe, that was Adamâ€™s job. He was in a terrible mood." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Amymarie814 add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "I am being perfectly fucking civil." -- Maggie Stiefvater
